text: Ezɨ Iesus danganir kam ategha zuima, gumazir damazir okavɨrɨzir pumuning an gɨn iza kamaghɨn an dei, “Nɨ Devitɨn Otarim, nɨ gan apangkufigh.”(9:27) Judaba ghaze, Gumazir God ua Gumazamiziba Iniasa Mɨsevezim, Atrivim Devitɨn ikɨzimɨn otivam. Gumazir damazir okavɨrɨzir kamning nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Iesus ikia ghaze, Israelba gumazir kamra mɨzuai. Kamaghɨn aning dia ghaze, “Devitɨn Otarim.”
